remarks: If F is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values greater than a given extended real B is an open set.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
rfcnpre1.1 $e |- F/_ x B $.
rfcnpre1.2 $e |- F/_ x F $.
rfcnpre1.3 $e |- F/ x ph $.
rfcnpre1.4 $e |- K = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
rfcnpre1.5 $e |- X = U. J $.
rfcnpre1.6 $e |- A = { x e. X | B < ( F ` x ) } $.
rfcnpre1.7 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
rfcnpre1.8 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
rfcnpre1 $p |- ( ph -> A e. J ) $.
